column4: anyone who have tried the latest version of Ubuntu Breezy? Is it worth a try or what?
it has grub/boot editor, system disks configurator, running services on/off config, :)
and ofcourse, new packages! Bleeding edge :)
I just noticed, preferences has an 'about me' to change user profile
do u have links to some screenshots?
it looks pretty much the same
do you want me to make some of the new features?
oh, and Synaptic searching is much faster
I'm sorry, I meant make screenshots
